website_summaries.verdict: This attractive water jug focuses on safety and temperature controls.
pros: We love that this cooler is BPA free
Great for sports and the great outdoors
Ergonomically designed to carry comfortably in most environments
Works great for hot and cold liquids
Receives the highest remarks from active customers
cons: Cap may be a little difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip even for small hands. Great design
customer_reviews.text: Usually these big bottles are awkward to carry but this one fits nicely in my small hands. The strap and design of the bottle make it easy to carry. I like the 2 different ways you can drink out of it. The only thing I would recommend is adding ounces to the outside. It measures in ML on the bottle but we use ounces in the US so having both would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: can use dishwasher to wash it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, looks very nice design and good quality. Especially, it can use dishwasher to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Lightweight and very convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this water bottle for almost everything like to go to the gym, at work or when I am doing a workout outside of the home. It holds enough water for good hydration without the bottle being too heavy. The bottle is so far leak proof and I love the design as it is so easy to carry around with handle plus the strap. Update: After almost a year, my bottle with full water dropped from around 6 foot high to concrete ground and made a crack.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I had this bottle a month before the plastic cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: Would consider buying again (water only)
customer_reviews.text: Great for water only. I use mixes occasionally and this was very difficult for clean properly with a small neck. Ended up with a bottle brush but was still very difficult. Ended up recycling it. The strap is very convenient and the lid is tight and snaps open and closed easily. Pros- ideal size for water and convenience. Durable Cons- very difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: dominic

customer_reviews.title: TOPWARE CHINA. Misleading and false title,bottle is not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: Title is misleading. This is bottle is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Sulman Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water jug for keeping hydrated at work. Large opening, and an air intake so you dont get that glug glug sound, this also prevents the jug from deforming by drinking from it. As a note about the seller, I had a minor issue and they made sure I was happy. I had a great experience beginning to end.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This product was good for about 2 months although it was very difficult to clean. I filled it up last night and got up this morning to 1/2 filled jug. There was a leak in the seam of the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good water bottle, but I’m giving it 4 stars because this became misshapen in my dishwasher, even though it says dishwasher safe. I can still use it thought and the material of the bottle and cap are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Florina

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this, it is the perfect size for a water bottle, and the handle is great! I try to have a gallon of water with me but it’s soooo big and clumsy, this is just perfect it looks strong, and I’ve had it over a month and dropped it a couple of times and it’s still good, scratched up but good with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bottles. They are durable and appear to be well constructed. That being said, after just under four months of use, one of the bottles started to leak. I contacted customer service, and they promptly sent me a replacement, so the company does stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: John Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Great way to increase your daily water intake but...
customer_reviews.text: This container is perfect. Nice color, thick and sturdy construction. I love the strap handle and the dispenser cover, dishwasher safe except my top and the strap melted in the dishwasher. I changed my rating to 5 stars because I was contacted by the company and they offered to send a replacement, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me hydrated!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and carry considering the weight. We don't have a water fountain at work, so this keeps me hydrated all day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: really good, really convenient, great quality Just make sure you don't tilt it too much when you drink out of it being super full or water will come out the tiny air hole
customer_reviews.author: Florian

customer_reviews.title: Just what we where looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he wanted a large water bottle that would last him all day at school and sports practice, and has worked out wonderfully. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to drink that water at work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is nice and lightweight, the top has not leaked once, the air return makes sure that you get a nice flow of water, and it can go in the dishwasher!! My favorite part of it is that I don't have to fill up with water at work anymore (don't like the taste of their water)!
customer_reviews.author: Molly B

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but the lanyard needs to be a different material, needs to be water resistant. The nylon or polyester just gets wet. Gets the job done though
customer_reviews.author: tb

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks after less than 1 month of use!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bottle, until I couldn’t understand why my nightstand had a water ring. This bottle has formed a leak at the seam near the bottom. No I can’t use it all and I’ve vasicalky wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Water taste weird after two hrs in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Water has a weird taste after it sits at room temperature in the bottle. I’d have to agree with the review on how it’s not BPA free. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Second water bottle like this and the second time it broke within 6 months. Not durable at all. The provider refunded me for the product in a timely fashion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Leak
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s dishwasher safe and the amount of water it can hold. Also, it’s fallen over on me and as long as the lid is secured, it does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle, it looks sleek and is easy to hold, and more importantly, easy to drink from!
customer_reviews.author: Rosealy

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Poor quality plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Good bottle for the price. I used mine everyday.. just wished they’d use a better quality plastic. Try not to drop, it will crack (even on carpet).
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Mine doesnt leak like some of the other reviews said. Strap is sturdy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good price and purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to drink and helps keep up with your water intake, leak proof, it’s great. Will definitely be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice water jug
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Love it for walks with the kids. Holds enough for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Carter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice looking bottle
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy nice looking bottle. Excellent for Arizona weather where you need to keep hidrated
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size, the mouthpiece is great for drinking. No leaks !
customer_reviews.author: Jenni L.

customer_reviews.title: Water tight and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for someone who is pushing themselves to drink more water!
customer_reviews.author: Justinwphoto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to carry, just wish the top was more wide for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Was a great water jug, until it started leaking!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Was offered a full refund, so I've changed my rating. The company was very prompt with responding to my review and quick to resolve the issue. Thank you! I've had this water jug since Jun 22, 2018 and today it started leaking from one of the manufacture seems, so disappointing!!! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N. Baxa

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: This bottle was exactly what I needed for working long 16hr shifts. The water flows perfectly when you drink.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea warren

customer_reviews.title: Great until it leaks after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first but just as soon as my return window closed with amazon, it began to leak and now it’s useless. There is a crack in the seam that I discovered after water was constantly leaking out of it. So unfortunate because otherwise it was a good bottle and had me drinking lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: J Karma

customer_reviews.title: Less trip for water refill!
customer_reviews.text: This wayer bottle is great! It is dishwasher safe and it doesn't leak even if you fill it up all the way! Less trip for refills too, because you you can put at least 2 liters of water in it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Large size water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: The large size was perfect for a persons daily water intake! It stayed sealed and never leaked!
customer_reviews.author: Joy T

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It broke after being dropping 1 time, it is very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: P.I.G

customer_reviews.title: High quality: no leaks or cracks after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months it still holds the water, no leaks, no cracks. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean very durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for water each day it holds the exact amount needed for my daily water intake
customer_reviews.author: letesha deleon

customer_reviews.title: Great for challenging yourself to drink  more water
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It challenge me to actually drink more water and that's the main reason why I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: A whole days water in a small bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Wow you can fit lots of water into this small handheld bottle. Easy to wash and when in use it's spill-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Good quality and usability. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bottle, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Used this bottle for work. It was a fantastic bottle. I would love to get another one, however,I don't want to spend money on something that may potentially break again very quickly. Unless of course, i got a bad bottle. Love the strap. It's easy to carry. On the cap, one of the tab broke off, making the tab useless. :/
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Big jug that fits nicely in my work mini fridge. You will be happy with this jug.
customer_reviews.author: katniss_everdeen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely liked it as it was a light and perfectly sized water bottle, but it sadly fell off from 2 feet and broke in a half.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: this water jug is an awesome for the gym or around the house
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Loved this water bottle until it broke (cracked straight up the side). It was dishwasher safe, but I think that’s what made it brittle and crack.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice water bottle......until I dropped it ONCE and it completely broke.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, Awesome  WATER FLOW.
customer_reviews.text: The water flow will take you to the next level! you will fly over the skies!
customer_reviews.author: freakyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: The size is awesome. The plastic is a little thinner than I expected so I wouldn’t recommend taking it anywhere it might drop, but if you’re trying to get your water in, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Krystie

customer_reviews.title: No plastic smell or taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday water jug for work! It's just what I needed to save $$ ( and environment) and stop buying water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jug
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and the perfect water jug for all types of adventures!! And when I needed help from the company, they were extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Katie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. I’ve had it over a week and nothing has gone wrong yet to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Araceli Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Pops open to easily so can never tip over without leakage
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bottle for increasing water intake. Strap is a nice addon for increased portability.
customer_reviews.author: Max Derose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water jug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water for work so I did not have to keep buying gallons of water at the store. Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Cracked & leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is only 5 months old and it cracked & leaks! So upset!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! By using this, I am able to drink the recommended 8 glasses of water a day.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4dara

customer_reviews.title: sweats a lot, which is normal
customer_reviews.text: i hate how it sweats but i love how much water is stored
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: dropped once with water in it on carpeted floor & it broke in half
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young kids, he carry this to school everyday. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: sohmhij asupxyifiqe

product_meta.title: topware 2.2l/75oz/Half Gallon Dishwasher Safe New Material Tritan Plastic Hot Cold Water Jug Container Big Capacity Large Leakproof Bpa Free Water Bottle for Fitness Camping
